text: Ted Cassidy (July 31, 1932 - January 16, 1979) was an American actor. He was best known for his roles as Lurch and Thing on The Addams Family. Cassidy died of surgery-related problems to remove a tumor from his heart on January 16, 1979. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:1932 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Deaths from heart cancer
title: Ted Cassidy
